Title: Relates to affirmative defenses for certain homicide offenses
Summary: Provides that it shall not be an affirmative defense for murder that the defendant's conduct resulted substantially from the discovery, knowledge or disclosure of the victim's sexual orientation, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression or sex assigned at birth.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to affirmative defenses to certain homicide offenses
